CrowdStrike IT outage: Kiwi mum pleads for Air New Zealand’s help after US flight delays strand family https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crowdstrike-it-outage-kiwi-mum-pleads-for-air-new-zeallands-help-after-us-flight-delays-strand-family/MFMOK2ENGVGBLC6T2P3DFZTYIE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crowdstrike-it-outage-kiwi-mum-pleads-for-air-new-zeallands-help-after-us-flight-delays-strand-family/MFMOK2ENGVGBLC6T2P3DFZTYIE/ Cherie Howie“All the communication is, ‘Go to the app, give them a call’, but it leads nowhere”. The family were late after their United flight was delayed by the CrowdStrike-sparked global IT outage.
